data.title: Repairs with the Bosch Home Appliances Service
data.meta_description: Bosch Home Appliances Service provides expert repair services that you can book 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
data.text:
Depending on the fault and the age and status of your appliance, our Bosch Home Appliances service will do an analysis and recommend whether a service repair is appropriate. We will give you advice on what is best to do. In most cases, a repair will be recommended as far as technically and economically worthwhile. Ultimately, it’s your decision about what happens to your appliance.

For repairs which requires an engineer's visit if a repair isn’t possible or not recommended in out-of-warranty cases, you will get a cashback of the call-out charge when buying a new Bosch Home appliance. Within the warranty, there will be solution, such as the exchange of your appliance.

If your appliance is covered by the two-year Bosch manufacturer warranty conditions there will no charge for the repair. In case the appliance is not covered by the manufacturer's warranty, you can check the fair and trasnsparent repair prices. Details you will get by selecting the appliance category which is concerned. Our customer service carefully monitors the repair prices to offer you the best possible value for money.
